title: The Bachelor's Monique Morley disrobes for bikini body 'self love'
text:
Monique Morley's life couldn't be better after getting booted from The Bachelor for calling Matt Agnew a 'dog c***' earlier this year.

On Saturday, the 26-year-old took to Instagram to share some 'self love' with her 23,000 followers while disrobing and flaunting her bikini body.

'I feel like a goddess in Homebodii,' gushed Monique, while slipping out of a silky customised dressing gown from the brand, which had her name emblazoned on the lapel.

Confident: The Bachelor's Monique Morley (pictured) took to Instagram to share some 'self love' with her 23,000 followers on Saturday while disrobing and flaunting her bikini body

Monique then flaunted her curves in the selfie-style video.

She repeatedly zoomed in and out, highlighting various parts of her incredible body, as she stood on a cow print rug in her minimalist Bondi bedroom.

'Some self love because we all need it,' she wrote, hoping to empower fans.

'I feel like a goddess in Homebodii,' gushed Monique, while slipping out of a silky customised dressing gown from the brand, which had her name on it and then standing in a bikini

Last week, Monique confirmed she had found love away from The Bachelor.

She shared a raunchy bath selfie with new boyfriend Cameron Bealey, a well-known personal trainer from Sydney's Northern Beaches.

In the picture, Cameron is seen lay on a naked Monique, while protecting her modesty as they enjoyed a coffee scrub beauty treatment together.

Raunchy: Last week Monique shared a naked bath selfie with new boyfriend Cameron Bealey (pictured), a well-known personal trainer from Sydney's Northern Beaches

Confirming their romance, Monique recently wrote: 'When what you were looking for was in-front if you the whole time.'

The pair knew each other prior to the blonde starring on the Channel 10 dating show.

However, it took the whirlwind experience that was Matt Agnew's season for Monique to seemingly realise all her heart wanted was Cameron.

Matt Agnew missed out! Confirming their romance, Monique recently wrote, 'When what you were looking for was in-front if you the whole time'
description: The Bachelor star Monique Morley's life couldn't be better after getting booted from the show for calling Matt Agnew a 'dog c***' earlier this year.
authors: Joshua Fox For Daily Mail Australia
